explanation: [0-0] A man in a white T-shirt sits beside a pile of black cushions. He raises his left hand above his head, elbow bent, fist clenched, with an exaggerated facial expression. A paper cup sits on the cushions.

[0-10] Then, he hits the paper cup with his elbow, sending it flying. The cushions collapse, and the man bursts into laughter. He proceeds to hit a can, a large Coke bottle, and a wooden board with his elbow, one after another. Now wearing a yellow T-shirt, he inverts a goblet containing blue liquid over his head, letting the liquid stream down.
